App Name: BP Tracker: Blood Pressure Hub

Brief: BP Tracker: Blood Pressure Hub stands as a comprehensive health companion, specially designed to assist individuals in monitoring and understanding their blood pressure. The app caters to users of all ages, offering a user-friendly interface and valuable insights that empowers its users to maintain healthier blood pressure levels through consistent tracking and logging.

  • Daily Blood Pressure Log: Track systolic, diastolic, and pulse rates with ease üìñ.
